type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Lineage Resonance[/i] – The “legend rule” doesn't apply to permanents you control.
[i]Falchion[/i] – When Marth & Chrom enter, create the Exalted Falchion and attach it to them.
[i]Mirror Strike [/i]– Whenever Marth & Chrom attack, create a copy of target permanent you control. If the copy is a creature, it enters tapped and attacking.
